name: Xingqiu
title: Juvenile Galant
description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.
description.1: The Rain Swords have the following properties:
2: When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
Increases the character's resistance to interruption.
description.4: 20% of Xingqiu's <hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</hydro> will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords.
description.6: The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
description.7: The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
description.8: Using this ability applies the <hydro>Wet</hydro> status onto the character.
description.10: "Easier to slay a rain dragon than to sever the rain."

description.0: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.
3: Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>.
Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.
description.5: The "Way of the Rain Cutter" is one of the esoteric secret techniques of the Guhua Sect.

description.0: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.
When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.
Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s.
description.1: Decreases the <hydro>Hydro RES</hydro> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3.
Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.
Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3.

constellation6.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses

description.0: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.
